body:
Regarding the inconsistency with `variable_scope`, we're deprecating `variable_scope` in TF 2.0 in favor of a more object-oriented approach (see [this RFC](https://github.com/tensorflow/community/blob/master/rfcs/20180817-variables-20.md)). So I'm still not convinced we should add this API -- it would be more convenient in some situations, but also could lead to confusion and is one more API endpoint.

@alextp @asimshankar do you have an opinion?
